allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - Signal Flow Workspace

React + Vite application for video signal flow diagrams with:
- Node components with configurable layouts \(columns/stacked\)
- System, Input, Output sections with dropdowns
- SVG-based wire connections with fluid movement
- Multi-page workspace support
- Anchor side toggle for stacked mode
- Signal color propagation through wire paths

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add GitHub Pages deployment

- Configure Vite base path for /node/ subdirectory
- Add GitHub Actions workflow for automatic deployment

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
